column5: Whoa! Dunno if my ultralite bass gear woulda been capable.  JF
Thats impressive, you would need a CHAINSAW to fillet that baby.
Not sure if the look on his face is strain or if hes trying not to puke. What a big boot!
OH MY GOD !!!!!   thats huge,man i would love to catch him on a downrigger,and watch him peel out 1,000ft of line in about 10 seconds !!!!!
The guy holding that dead fish must be holding his breath.   That's a monster.
That would require one big hickory plank for the bbq.
Thats one big nasty looking monster.
That's crazy, looks like a damn ant eater with fins.
Would certainly be entertaining to hook that on the float reel
we catch em in the grand like that all the time
I'm sure it's legit, but the fact that foxnews broke the story makes me a little suspicious   .
Awesome.... what a giant freak of nature
